performance_metrics.name: Uptime (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of time the server management system is operational and accessible.  This is the primary indicator of system reliability.

performance_metrics.name: Response Time (Avg. Query)
performance_metrics.description: Average time taken for the system to respond to a user request or command. Crucial for usability and efficient operations.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Queries/Second)
performance_metrics.description: Number of queries the system can process per second under sustained load.  Dependent on server capacity and system optimization.

performance_metrics.name: CPU Utilization (Avg.)
performance_metrics.description: Average utilization of the server’s central processing unit. High utilization indicates potential bottlenecks.

performance_metrics.name: Memory Utilization (Avg.)
performance_metrics.description: Average usage of system RAM.  Insufficient memory can significantly degrade performance.

performance_metrics.name: Storage I/O Latency
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to read or write data to storage.  Impacts application responsiveness and data access speeds.

performance_metrics.name: Alert Response Time
performance_metrics.description: Time taken for the system to detect and report an alert. Critical for proactive problem-solving.

implementation_requirements.name: Authentication & Authorization
implementation_requirements.specification: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) with role-based access control (RBAC) implemented.  Separation of duties enforced.
implementation_requirements.description: Secure access control to protect sensitive data and prevent unauthorized modifications.

implementation_requirements.name: Scalability
implementation_requirements.specification: Architecture designed for horizontal scaling – ability to add additional servers to handle increased load.  Supports 100+ servers.
implementation_requirements.description: System must adapt to growing data volumes and user demand.

implementation_requirements.name: Backup & Recovery
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated daily full backups to offsite storage.  Point-in-time recovery (PITR) capability with a Recovery Time Objective (RTO) of ≤ 4 hours and a Recovery Point Objective (RPO) of ≤ 1 hour.
implementation_requirements.description: Data protection strategy to minimize downtime and data loss.

implementation_requirements.name: Monitoring & Logging
implementation_requirements.specification: Real-time monitoring of all key system metrics. Centralized logging with structured data format (e.g., JSON) and integration with a SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system.
implementation_requirements.description: Continuous tracking of system health and performance for proactive issue identification.

implementation_requirements.name: API Integrations
implementation_requirements.specification: Secure APIs for integration with existing IT infrastructure (e.g., Active Directory, ticketing systems, monitoring tools).
implementation_requirements.description: Seamless data exchange with other systems for improved automation and management.

implementation_requirements.name: Configuration Management
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated configuration management using tools like Ansible or Puppet.
implementation_requirements.description: Standardized configurations across all servers, reducing errors and simplifying management.

industry_standards: PCI DSS (if processing credit card transactions)
ITIL Framework (for IT Service Management practices)
operational_considerations: Patch Management – Automated and Timely Patching
